mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REPORT ( REPORT_ID, REPORT_TARGET_TYPE, REPORT_TARGET_ID, USER_ID, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID, REPORT_TARGET_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{reportId}, #{reportTargetType}, #{reportTargetId}, #{userId}, #{reportReason}, SYSDATE, 'PENDING', SYSDATE, #{createId}, SYSDATE, #{updatedId}, #{reportTargetUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_ID AS reportId, REPORT_TARGET_TYPE AS reportTargetType, REPORT_TARGET_ID AS reportTargetId, USER_ID AS userId, REPORT_REASON AS reportReason, REPORT_DATE AS reportDate, REPORT_STATUS AS reportStatus, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, CREATE_ID AS createId, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate, UPDATED_ID AS updatedId, REPORT_TARGET_USER_ID AS reportTargetUserId FROM TB_REPORT WHERE REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = #{targetType} AND REPORT_TARGET_ID = #{targetId} ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC

SELECT r.REPORT_ID AS reportId, r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE AS reportTargetType, r.REPORT_TARGET_ID AS reportTargetId, r.USER_ID AS userId, r.REPORT_REASON AS reportReason, r.REPORT_DATE AS reportDate, r.REPORT_STATUS AS reportStatus, r.REPORT_TARGET_USER_ID AS reportTargetUserId,
-- ✅ [핵심] 이동할 페이지의 부모 ID(PK) 계산 CASE -- 1. 사용자 추천글 본문 신고 (ID가 곧 게시글 ID) WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'moviepost' THEN r.REPORT_TARGET_ID
-- 2. 사용자 추천글의 '댓글' 신고 (댓글 테이블의 TARGET_ID가 moviePostId) WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'movieusercomment' THEN TO_NUMBER(c.TARGET_ID)
-- 3. 인기 영화의 '댓글' 신고 (댓글 테이블의 TARGET_ID가 movieId) WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'moviecomment' THEN TO_NUMBER(c.TARGET_ID)
-- (기타 뮤직, 보드 등 기존 로직 유지) WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE IN ('musicpost', 'boardpost') THEN r.REPORT_TARGET_ID WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE IN ('musiccomment', 'boardcomment') THEN TO_NUMBER(c.TARGET_ID)
ELSE 0 END AS postId,
-- ✅ 신고된 내용 미리보기 (글 제목 또는 댓글 내용) CASE WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'moviepost' THEN mp.MOVIE_POST_TITLE WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE IN ('movieusercomment', 'moviecomment') THEN c.COMMENT_TEXT
-- (기타 기존 로직) WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'musicpost' THEN mu.MUSIC_POST_TITLE WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'boardpost' THEN b.COMMUNITY_TITLE WHEN r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE IN ('musiccomment', 'boardcomment') THEN c.COMMENT_TEXT ELSE '내용 없음' END AS postTitleOrCommentText
FROM TB_REPORT r
-- 1. 사용자 추천글 조인 (moviepost) LEFT JOIN TB_MOVIE_POST mp ON r.REPORT_TARGET_ID = mp.MOVIE_POST_ID AND r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'moviepost'
-- 2. 댓글 테이블 조인 (공통) LEFT JOIN TB_COMMENT c ON r.REPORT_TARGET_ID = c.COMMENT_ID AND r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE IN ('movieusercomment', 'moviecomment', 'musiccomment', 'boardcomment')
-- (기타 조인 유지) LEFT JOIN TB_MUSIC_POST mu ON r.REPORT_TARGET_ID = mu.MUSIC_POST_ID AND r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'musicpost' LEFT JOIN TB_COMMUNITY b ON r.REPORT_TARGET_ID = b.COMMUNITY_POST_ID AND r.REPORT_TARGET_TYPE = 'boardpost'
ORDER BY r.REPORT_DATE DESC
